message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a one-time offer of $1,200,000. This is a fair price considering the value you place on the product at $800,000. If you're interested, let me know, and we can discuss the details. If not, I have another interested buyer lined up who is willing to pay $1,500,000.
